answers.answer: I've taken Glucose/diabetes test, 1st trimester screening (opt'l), Flu shot, and 2 ultrasounds.  I'm sorta high risk prego. Good luck at ur appt!
I just had a group b strep test done, an 35 weeks along. If you have it they give you antibiotics when you go in to labor. You'll probably want to look it up, I can't remember exactly what it is
I took my glucose two days ago and bc my blood pressure is low i almost passed out its not so bad thought tastes lik orange juice

question: I'm now 20 weeks and everyone talks about all these test you have to have done. I'm going Monday for a monthly check up. When do you start diabetes testing and is that the only thing they test for?
title: testing
